name: Sarah & James T.
text: From the first phone call to the final polish, The Quartz Company were exceptional. Our Calacatta Gold island is the centrepiece of our new kitchen and we couldn't be happier.

name: David M.
text: The quality of the quartz and the precision of the templating were outstanding. The fitters were courteous, tidy and incredibly skilled. Would recommend without hesitation.

name: Emily R.
text: We agonised over colours for weeks, but the free samples made the decision easy. The Arctic Frost looks absolutely stunning with our navy cabinets. Worth every penny.

name: Michael & Kate W.
text: Brilliant service from start to finish. The design consultation helped us choose the perfect edge profile and sink cut-out. Installation was completed in a single day.

name: Laura P.
text: Third time using The Quartz Company and they never disappoint. Our latest project was an Emerald Coast worktopâ€”the colour is breathtaking. True craftspeople.

name: Tom & Helen G.
text: The finance option made our dream kitchen affordable. The whole process, from measuring to installation, was smooth and professional. Our Carrara Mist is gorgeous.
